item.title: [Work-Post] RBI Report on Trends and Progress in Banking in India 2019-20
item.description:
I’m privileged to share that I’ve contributed to the 2019-20 RBI Report on Trends and Progress in Banking in India. Do check out Chapter 2 (and Box II.1 therein), co-authored with Dr. Snehal Herwadkar, Director of Banking Research and the incredible editor of the report, and (the amazing) Bhanu Pratap on global savings since COVID-19: here.

Or better, read the entire report here.

item.title: Indian Migrants During COVID-19
item.description:
A report I led for Cefala, Schofield, and Kaur at the Behavioral Development Lab, Chennai, studying the household economy, food security, access to state services, location, health and health information, and beliefs of migrant workers during COVID-19: here!

Downloadable data and documentation: here.
